About.Hours & facilities: Open by appointment only. General reference assistance available. Copying services available for books, journals, photographs and newspapers.

About.Access: Advance notice of visit required. Proof of identity required. Access to records not normally available for research can be gained by authorisation from the Museum Curator.

About.Acquisition focus: Material relating to history of Canowindra and district and families from these areas. (5% in-house ).
